titleStmt.title: The true and most miraculous narrative, of a child born with two tongues, at the lower end of East-Smithfeild [sic] in the suburbs of London, &c. who three dayes after his birth, was heard plainly, and expresly [sic] to cry out, A king, a king, a king ...

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Harper neer the Hospital Gate in Smithfield,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: British Library.
